---
category: news
title: "Sensory Releases Speech Recognition for Children"
excerpt: "Accurately recognizing children's speech is challenging because it differs from adult speech in many ways. A scarcity of available training data makes this problem even more difficult to solve. Over many years Sensory collected and analyzed significant amounts of children's speech to better understand and model the specificsof how children talk."
